message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product for $9500. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, considering its value to you is $8000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm confident that this is a price that we can both be happy with.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. However, I must respectfully decline your offer of $8500. Considering the quality and value of the product, I believe it's worth a bit more. I propose we meet in the middle at $9000. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I propose $8750. This is the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product.
